data.name: RPG Maker MV - Epic Strings
data.detailed_description:
From mournful cello to intense violin and mysterious harp, there's something about string instruments that gives them a truly special sound.

Composed by Murray Atkinson, Epic Strings is a set of 14 music themes (and one bonus theme remastering) that covers a variety of orchestral themes. From mysterious dragons to adrenaline-inducing battles, this pack is a must have for every music enthusiast!

This pack contains:
  • 14 unique music themes.
  • Music for battle, horror, exploration and more
  • .m4a, .wav, .ogg, and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.

data.short_description: Epic Strings is a set of 14 music themes (and one bonus theme remastering) that covers a variety of orchestral themes.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Epic Strings
